trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Chester
There were no other sightings in Chester on or around January 12th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside having a cigarette when I saw them. There were 5 UFOs. I shouted to my friends and they saw the UFOs with me. I asked my friend to take a photo but they didnt show up on the camera phone. They came from the south south west and were heading north north east then they changed direction and headed straight north. There were 5 of them. Four spheres that looked like they were on fire and on triangular one with two red lights. We saw them for about a minute before they disappeared. My first proper UFO sighting.
